itemDescription: Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross

wikipedia_page.main: David Spence VC (1818 – 17 April 1877) was a Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross.

response: * David Spence, recipient of the Victoria Cross for his actions during the Indian Rebellion of 1857

link_mentions.page: List of Scottish Victoria Cross recipients

response: *David Spence, Troop Sergeant Major - Indian Mutiny, 17 January 1858
